title: Extreme Lag. Riot please help! The game is ungameable!
body:
Hi there. I have been playing for a few months now and had no issues with lag until around 40 days ago when I experienced extreme lag for no reason for many games in a row. I was "leaver busted" a few times too, due to drops in connection with the server. My partner and I both play on the same internet and he is having no troubles at all. I have upgraded my modem, had my computer looked at and updated and still I am having these issues. I have been unable to play a game through for over a month now and it is saddening me. I really enjoy your game but I really can not play at 4k ping. 

I note I am not the only one mentioning incredible ping in game. Others who were just in a game with next to no ping, are crippled by 800 ping this round. 

Is it a compatibility issue? Any ideas as to how to resolve this? I am going a little crazy here :P

Many thanks,
Lyri

replies.body: are they lag spikes or frame rate crashes. My theory is leagues is have errors galore that lock up the game for less than a second and because the game locks up it "registers" as a latency issue.
I haven't spiked once since playing on NA, maybe I have and I'm just used to playing on 300ping.

I've been getting lag spikes very often, but they are like 200-400ms not extreme 1k+, my usually latency is around 30-40 and it makes it very hard to play most of the time when it will spike out of nowhere.
